attributes.action: Stop banning dogs and introduce stricter laws for owning a dog
attributes.additional_details: The new law banning dogs that are XL bulldogs or similar looking is extremely cruel on the dogs that are extremely well behaved dogs! Most of the dog attacks are from small dogs. It’s not the dogs fault it’s the owner.
attributes.background: Instead of banning a dog breed maybe introduce laws where dog owners need to have training and licenses to own a dog.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Replace ban on certain dog breeds with licences, muzzles and leads for all dogs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652710

Abolish the Dangerous Dogs Act and introduce new rules for dog owners/breeders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/659338
